##Set up
```{r}
library(knitr)
library(rentrez)
library(pegas)
library(stringr)
library(plyr)
library(geomedb)
library(strataG)
```
##Query metadata
#Just looked through general longitude and latitudes to get majority of the data
```{r}
holothuria_meta <- queryMetadata(
  entity = "Sample",
  query = "genus = Holuthuria AND specificEpithet = atra AND decimalLongitude: [-178 TO 179] AND decimalLatitude: [-28 TO 28] AND _exists_:sequence",
  select="Event")
View(holothuria_meta$Event)
View(holothuria_meta$Sample)

#No metadata seen? Maybe it hasn't loaded yet? Maybe it's my internet?
#Too much data I tried to load?
```

##Subset the metadata
```{r}
holothuria_event_info <-holothuria_meta$Event[,c("locality", "country", "decimalLatitude", "decimalLongitude", "eventID")]
kable(holothuria_event_info)
```
##Query FASTA
```{r}
listLoci()
```

```{r}
holothuria_CO1 <- querySanger(
  query = "genus = Holuthuria AND specificEpithet = atra AND decimalLongitude: [-178 TO 179] AND decimalLatitude: [-28 TO 28] AND _exists_:sequence", locus = "CO1")
holothuria_CO1
```
#Maybe my search is too broad?
#Trying to shorten search
```{r}
holothuria_CO1 <- querySanger(
  query = "genus = Holuthuria AND specificEpithet = atra AND decimalLongitude: [-178 TO -100] AND decimalLatitude: [-28 TO 5] AND _exists_:sequence", locus = "CO1")
holothuria_CO1

```
